input_email_body:
Subject: Encountering Unusual Billing Errors Across Several Products

I am currently facing unexpected billing failures for several of my products You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. I have already confirmed my account details, reviewed the payment gateway status, and restarted the necessary services. The problem might stem from a payment gateway error or a subscription synchronization issue My name is David Kim.. I would greatly appreciate your support in addressing this issue. Could you assist me in pinpointing the cause and offer a solution to avoid similar problems in the future?
